Record Store Day. Atlanta CD Store
data.meta_description: Since 1976. Buy-Sell-Trade. We carry Atlanta`s finest selection of used & new vinyl (LP Albums & 45s). Used CDs, DVDs and Cassette Tapes too!
data.text:
About Us

Since 1976. Buy-Sell-Trade. We carry Atlanta`s finest selection of used & NEW vinyl (LPs & 45s). Used CDs and cassette tapes too!

All genres, from the 1950s thru current day. Classic Rock / Indie-Alternative / Punk / Pop / Jazz / Blues Soul / R&B / Country / Classical / Lounge / Vocalists Sound Effects / Foreign / Soundtracks / Reggae / Space Age Exotica / Strange & Bizarre

Huge selection of 45s (1950s â€“ 1980s)

Large NEW VINYL section. New releases, plus reissues of rock, jazz, blues & pop classics!

Music DVDs

Posters & stickers (the city`s best selection!)

Rock `n Roll collectibles

Music magazine back issues

We carry RECORD CRATES and a complete line of record cleaning supplies.

Come by and see why the likes of Robert Plant, Eric Clapton, Elvis Costello, Chris Robinson, Andre 3000, and Peter Buck make it a point of always stopping by our store when in town to feed their record collecting habits.

Learn More

Buy & Sell Policies

We buy, or take in trade, quality LPs, Cassettes & CDs. Whether you have just a few or a large collection. If it`s something we need, we`re interested! (404) 237-3193

Learn More

New Stuff Just In

We get new stuff in every week! Please check here for updates!

Learn More

RECORD STORE DAY 2024 is Saturday APRIL 20!

Posted by allen on Apr 17, 2024

RECORD STORE DAY 2024 is Saturday APRIL 20! 10am-7pm. For list of releases go to RecordStoreDay.com
